detectors.description:
CxipAssetProxy (../../smart-contract-sanctuary/ethereum/contracts/mainnet/proxies/0.8.4/7244b023160281AdDCc69C3DB0E589C695fACade_CxipAssetProxy.sol/7244b023160281AdDCc69C3DB0E589C695fACade_CxipAssetProxy.sol#26-45) may be an upgradeable proxy.
_target is declared in the proxy.
CxipAssetProxy.fallback()._target (../../smart-contract-sanctuary/ethereum/contracts/mainnet/proxies/0.8.4/7244b023160281AdDCc69C3DB0E589C695fACade_CxipAssetProxy.sol/7244b023160281AdDCc69C3DB0E589C695fACade_CxipAssetProxy.sol#29) gets value from a cross-contract call: IRegistry(0x3d0Ac6CDcd6252684Fa459E7A03Dd1ceaCc01Ade).getAssetSource()
IRegistry appears to be a Beacon contract for the proxy
No setter functions found to search for compatibility checks.
